name: Hearthfire
description:
[Unfinished]

Keep the fire alive grabing wood but be wary, if you stay on the dark for too long you will die

click on trees to chop them

press Space to craft a torch

press E to place wood in fireplace

  • All the art, 3d model, music and scripts used in this game were produced by:

-Carlos Matheus Barros da Silva -https://github.com/CarlosMatheus

-Luiz Henrique Aguiar de Lima Alves - https://github.com/HikkusT

-Juan Marco de Jesus Libonatti - https://github.com/WarXenozord
